titleStmt.title: A brief reply to George Whitehead's book stiled, A rambling pilgrim in answer to a book intituled The pilgrim's progress from Quakerism to Christianity : shewing the danger of the Quakers government within the government and opposite to it ... contrary to the laws of the land and particularly to the Act of Toleration / by Francis Bugg.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Janeway, Jun. and sold by J. Robinson and C. Brome,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
